attributes.action: Stop the proposed closure of Alderden House (for children with attachment disorder )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alderden House in Deal is the only residential unit in Kent that offers placements for children with servere attachment disorders - servere emotional and behaviour problems.
It has been stated by Kent County Council Childrens Social services that MOST children in care benifit from living in a family placement but some children whom have had a very bad experience of family life may need a period of special help within a residential unit.
It is proposed to close Alderden to allow all children to be offered the chance to live in a family environment.
We believe it is vital that a small minority of children be offered a residential placement such as Alderden House, and the proposed closure should not go ahead.
